Scheduled maintenance: Wednesday, December 7, 2022, at 8 AM UTC
Due to scheduled upgrades, all Bitstamp services will be temporarily unavailable

Due to scheduled infrastructure upgrades and maintenance, all our services and features on bitstamp.net, including logins and signups, will be temporarily unavailable on Wednesday, December 7, 2022, starting at 8:00 AM UTC (9:00 AM CET). The maintenance will last approximately 1 hour.

After this period, most support services should be back online, but some features may take slightly longer to get back to full speed due to the nature of the upgrade. We will make sure to keep you updated on our Twitter channel.
Due to scheduled upgrades, all Bitstamp services will be temporarily unavailable.
